Name: Constricted VR
About the game: The Hallway - Now Available! Do you have what it takes to escape? Constricted VR is a fully immersive Escape-The-Room style game exclusively for the HTC Vive. Beginning in a central hub, you can select from two different escape rooms with varying themes and puzzles. From the basement of a psychopath to a mysterious hallway, the environments are different and exciting. You may even discover some secrets while exploring both escape rooms. Please note that this game is not meant to be easy, so you must use every ounce of your deductive skills to escape each room!
Meta Title: Constricted VR: Jul 10, 2018, PNxDesigns and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Constricted VR? Check out the release date (Jul 10, 2018), developer insights from PNxDesigns, and a complete game summary.
